name: lotus belt buckle, Japanese flower tattoo style
description:
See more buckles at www.LonesomeRoadStudio.com. 
The pink lotus flower womens belt buckle was inspired by Japanese style tattoo art and is a miniature wearable work of art. A candy pink-peach lotus flower serenely rests upon stylized green leaves, afloat on calm blue waters, and only at Lonesome Road Studio.

Aqua hues decorate the background of the lotus flower artwork and the art warmly blushes in shades of pinks, golden greens and almost-turquoise blues. It is affixed to a cast pewter buckle that measures 2-1/2 inches by 3-1/4 inches (6.2cm x 8cm) and will fit either a 1-1/2 inch (3.8cm) or 1-3/4 (4.4cm) inch wide belt. High-gloss epoxy resin protects the artwork with an extremely durable finish.
 
This buckle is made to order. After payment, please allow 7 days for production time.
 
The belt is not included.
 
Lonesome Road Studio accepts Paypal. You may also pay with a major credit card without a Paypal account by using their guest option; follow their simple instructions to pay with this method.
 
Become a Lonesome Road Studio fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LonesomeRoadStudio
 
Subscriber-only specials, news and more when you sign up for my e-mailing list click on the link at the bottom right!

name: belt buckle, vintage style heart tattoo - Retro Tattoo Love Heart
description:
See more buckles at www.LonesomeRoadStudio.com. 
Get your Sailor Jerry on... romance with old school tattoo retro style! The Retro Tattoo Love Heart women's belt buckle by Lonesome Road Studio features a rich red heart proclaiming "Love" in vintage-style tattoo artwork on a light brown background embellished with red roses. 

The reproduction of original Lonesome Road Studio artwork is affixed to a cast pewter buckle that measures 2-1/2 inches by 3-1/4 inches (6.2cm x 8cm) and will fit either a 1-1/2 inch (3.8cm) or 1-3/4 (4.4cm) inch wide belt. High-gloss epoxy resin protects the artwork with an extremely durable finish.

This buckle is made to order. After payment, please allow 7 days for production time.
 
The belt is not included, it is from my own collection.

name: flower belt buckle, henna tattoo flower - Mehendi Blossom - boho, earthy, rustic, free spirit
description:
See more buckles at www.LonesomeRoadStudio.com. 
The Mehendi Blossom women's belt buckle was inspired by henna tattoo art, a beautiful method of self-expression and body art design, and is a unique addition to bohemian styles. Wear it with your old leather jacket and vintage cowboy boots, a long flowing gauzy skirt, or any of your other free-spirited, gypsy-at-heart pieces favorites!
 
The original Lonesome Road Studio artwork of a henna tattoo-inspired flower and leaves is illustrated in rich earthtones of browns, warm golden yellows, rusty henna and sweet honey tans and is affixed to a cast pewter buckle that measures 2-1/2 inches by 3-1/4 inches (6.2cm x 8cm) and will fit either a 1-1/2 inch (3.8cm) or 1-3/4 (4.4cm) inch wide belt. High-gloss epoxy resin protects the artwork with an extremely durable finish.
 
This buckle is made to order. After payment, please allow 7 days for production time.
 
The belt is not included, it is a handwoven vintage Mexican belt from my own collection.
 
Lonesome Road Studio accepts Paypal. You may also pay with a major credit card without a Paypal account by using their guest option; follow their simple instructions to pay with this method.

name: yin yang belt buckle, henna tattoo body art design - boho, earthy, rustic, free spirit
description:
See more buckles at www.LonesomeRoadStudio.com.
The yin yang symbol henna body art style belt buckle was inspired by exotic mehendi tattoos, a beautiful method of self-expression, and is a unique complement to free-spirited boho styles... great with vintage cowboy boots, ethnic embroidery, bohemian hippie looks and more. You might even find a way to wear it with your yoga pants. You'll love the warm, rustic colors and intricate art of this lovely Lonesome Road Studio buckle!

The original Lonesome Road Studio artwork is illustrated in rich earthtones of rich henna brown colors on a neutral background and is affixed to a cast pewter buckle that measures 2-1/2 inches by 3-1/4 inches (6.2cm x 8cm) and will fit either a 1-1/2 inch (3.8cm) or 1-3/4 (4.4cm) inch wide belt. High-gloss epoxy resin protects the artwork with an extremely durable finish.

This buckle is made to order. After payment, please allow 7 days for production time.

The belt is not included, it is a handwoven vintage Mexican belt from my own collection.

name: peach blossom pink flower belt buckle, Movin To The Country Gonna Eat A Lotta Peaches
description:
As seen in the February/March 2013 issue of Cowboys & Indians Magazine!

See more belt buckles at www.LonesomeRoadStudio.com.
A bright spring pink peach blossom is illustrated on a rich blue background, from a photograph taken in my own country gardens, and turned into a uniquely beautiful womens belt buckle by Lonesome Road Studio. 

This buckle is made to order; please allow at least one week for production and proper curing time. Contact me at LonesomeRoadWest@gmail.com for orders of more than one buckle.

The Lonesome Road Studio artwork of a lovely pink peach blossom is affixed to a cast pewter buckle that measures 2-1/2 inches by 3-1/4 inches (6.2cm x 8cm) and will fit either a 1-1/2 inch (3.8cm) or 1-3/4 (4.4cm) inch wide belt. High-gloss epoxy resin protects the artwork with an extremely durable finish.

Lonesome Road Studio has moved to www.LonesomeRoadStudio.com, where you'll find many, many more buckle designs as well as fun art jewelry and hair accessories. Visit Lonesome Road West on Etsy for pure silver, turquoise and leather.

Do you have a special idea for something you'd love to see on a belt buckle for yourself, or for someone else? Contact me at LonesomeRoadWest@gmail.com; Lonesome Road Studio can make it happen!

In the Ottawa, IL area? See original Lonesome Road Studio fine art at the Ottawa Art League gallery at Jeremiah Joe Coffee, 807 LaSalle St. - www.OttawaArtLeague.org.

Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LonesomeRoadStudio 

Get exclusive offers, discounts, and the very latest news here: http://lonesomeroadstudio.bigcartel.com/be-the-first-to-know-sign-up-for-the-lonesome-road-studio-newsletter
